April 6, 1975 D York & District BBA Contest (2nd Section)
York & District BBA Contest (2nd Section) 20 Test Piece Contest York & District BBA Contest york-district-bba-contest-2nd-section
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
York College of Further Education, Tadcaster Road, York March contest - 1st Thorne, 2nd Beverley, 3rd Harrogate. Hymn tune contest - 1st Acton Hall, 2nd Thorne. 17th annual contest. 7 bands competed.
May 13, 2013, 3:02 p.m. May 11, 2014, 8:46 p.m.
1 Thorne Town T. Sellers
2 Askern Colliery Band Ed Pearce
3 Ackton Hall Colliery Band D. Metcalfe
Unknown Result Beverley Brass H. G. Crouch
Unknown Result Driffield Silver Band Unknown
Unknown Result Harrogate Band Neil Richmond
